description: The index includes U.S.-listed securities, including ADRs, of companies that are offering technology-driven financial services, which includes companies that facilitate decentralized finance systems. The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets in financial instruments, such as swap agreements, securities of the index, and ETFs that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index or to ETFs that track the index. It is non-diversified.
name: Direxion Daily Fintech Bull 2X Shares
